Ein sehr tolles Spiel mit sehr vielen Herausforderungen!
Man brauch Strategie, Taktik und natürlich Konzentration und Reflexe.
Am besten ist es wenn man mit Freunden zusammen Matchmaking oder Wingman spielt.

I have played the game since late 2015 and the game is very good. a downside however is the matchmaking system being practically unplayable even in prime. Id say about 50% of the time i play matchmaking i will find a cheater. It is also basically impossible to rank up in solo queue in EU, as you will usually encounter a language barrier with teammates and many seem to take the game as a joke. The game is great however the matchmaking system needs to be fixed and players need to be assessed properly as Trust Factor is clearly not working as even in high trust factors there seems to be constant trolls and low trust factor is full of cheaters.

This game is great but i would recommend using a third party matchmaking system such as FACEIT or ESEA as they have a required anti cheat which prevents you from going against cheaters and players tend to be a lot more serious.
